name: rise (itch) (zzox)
description:
A challenging vertical-scrolling combat-platformer. Made using Phaser 3. Inspired by Celeste and Towerfall, as well as games with vertical scrolling levels like Rayman. All music, sound effects, sprites, animations and game programming were created by zzox (tyler). The font is a slightly altered version of Manaspace Font. The backgrounds were created by using images in the public domain and converting them to pixel art with Pixelator. All code is convered under the MIT license, while all assests are covered under the CC-BY-Attribution license.

Performs best in Firefox. 

Directions: W,A,S,D

Select: Enter

Moves: I, J, K, L
